title: Tim McCarver, big league catcher and broadcaster, dies at 81
description: The famed broadcaster and former St. Louis Cardinals star Tim McCarver has died

title: The prices of these products have dropped, defying high inflation
description: Smartphones and bacon are among the products that have fallen in price, despite sky-high inflation.

title: Judge raises possibility of revoking Sam Bankman-Fried's bail
description: A judge raised the possibility of revoking bail and remanding Sam Bankman-Fried into custody for possible witness tampering.

title: Is Bing too belligerent? Microsoft looks to tame AI chatbot
description: Microsoft’s newly revamped Bing search engine can write recipes and songs and quickly explain just about anything it can find on the internet

title: Mural honoring the life of Tyre Nichols unveiled at Memphis restaurant
description: Memphis graffiti artist, David Yancy, released a mural to celebrate the life of 29-year-old Tyre Nichols, whose death on Jan. 10 following a traffic stop sparked outrage.

title: Body camera footage shows shootout with man accused of killing sheriff's deputy
description: Newly released footage shows the dramatic freeway chase and shootout late last year between law enforcement and a suspect accused of killing a sheriff's deputy.

title: Fetterman checks himself into hospital for treatment with 'severe' depression: Staff
description: John Fetterman checked himself into Walter Reed hospital "to receive treatment for clinical depression," his chief of staff said on Thursday

title: Court hears Josh Duggar's appeal of child porn conviction
description: A federal appeals court panel is considering whether to reverse the child pornography conviction of former reality TV star Josh Duggar

title: Tesla recalling more than 360K cars over potential crash risk
description: The Tesla cars are equipped with Full Self-Driving Beta software, the NHTSA said.

title: Minnesota woman sentenced to life for 6-year-old son's death
description: A 29-year-old Minnesota woman who was convicted of killing her 6-year-old son and hiding his body in the trunk of her car has been sentenced to life in prison

title: 2 deputies who tried to hide involvement in Tyre Nichols' death suspended
description: The Shelby County Sheriff's Office announced Wednesday that it has suspended two patrol deputies in connection with the death of Tyre Nichols.

title: Deputy attorney general warns against using TikTok, citing data privacy
description: "I don't use TikTok and I would not advise anybody to do so because of these concerns," Lisa Monaco, deputy attorney general at the DOJ, said Thursday.

title: Biden to speak on suspected spy balloon and 3 flying objects shot down
description: Biden will address "the United States’ response to recent aerial objects" from the South Court Auditorium, according to the White House

title: Susan Wojcicki stepping down as CEO of YouTube
description: Susan Wojcicki is stepping down as CEO at YouTube after spending nine years as the head of the social media platform

title: Lonely tunes: Humpback whales wail less as population grows
description: A new study suggests those melancholy tunes sung by humpback whales may really be a sign of loneliness

title: Georgia grand jury recommends perjury indictments in 2020 election interference probe
description: A Georgia grand jury found 'no widespread fraud' in its 2020 election probe, and is recommending perjury indictments against witnesses who may have lied during testimony.

title: School reverses urinal ban after bathroom access debate
description: A New Hampshire school board has reversed a decision banning middle and high school students from using urinals after dozens protested the measure

title: WATCH:  Good Samaritans rescue dog from canal
description: A group of good Samaritans successfully hauled a dog stuck in a Manchester, England, canal back up to its owner.

title: 3-year-old boy fatally shoots himself with handgun left in nightstand
description: A 3-year-old boy fatally shot himself with a handgun Wednesday evening in DeLand, Florida.

title: Kentucky high court lets near-total abortion ban continue
description: Kentucky’s Supreme Court has refused to allow abortions to resume in the state, rejecting a request to halt enforcement of a near-total ban on abortion that has largely been in place since Roe v. Wade was overturned

title: WATCH:  How to introduce your dog to your baby
description: Theo the Siberian husky shows us how to safely introduce a pup to their new human sibling.

title: Pope Francis underlines that papacy is a lifetime post
description: Pope Francis has made clear in comments published by a Jesuit journal that he believes being pope is a lifetime position and that the late Pope Benedict XVI’s resignation was an exception

title: Why experts are struggling to gauge the health impacts of the Ohio chemical spill
description: Hydrogen chloride and phosgene can cause symptoms like eye or throat irritation or even respiratory issues like difficulty breathing.

title: Group: Tesla workers fired after launching union efforts
description: Several employees at a Tesla gigafactory in Buffalo, New York have been fired after launching union organizing efforts two days ago, according to Tesla Workers United

title: Weekly jobless applications fall again despite Fed rate push
description: Fewer Americans filed for jobless benefits last week, more evidence that the Federal Reserve’s efforts to loosen the labor market by raising interest rates hasn’t taken hold

title: Family speaks out to warn others after deadly tubing accident in Aruba
description: In March 2022, the Murrays' 13-year-old daughter died during a tubing accident while the family was on vacation in Aruba.

title: Red Cross chief warns of health crisis in quake-hit Syria
description: The Red Cross' global chief says Syria could face dangerous outbreaks of disease in the wake of last week’s devastating earthquake if hundreds of thousands of displaced people do not get permanent housing soon

title: WATCH:  Kansas City Chiefs celebrate Super Bowl LVII win at parade
description: An estimated 500,000 Chiefs fans turned out to celebrate the team’s second Super Bowl title in four years on Wednesday.

title: South Korea defense report revives 'enemy' label for North
description: South Korea has referred to North Korea as “our enemy” in its biennial defense document, reviving the label for its rival for the first time in six years

title: China sanctions Lockheed Martin, Raytheon for Taiwan sales
description: China has imposed trade and investment sanctions on U.S. military contractors Lockheed Martin and Raytheon for supplying weapons to Taiwan, stepping up efforts to isolate the island democracy claimed by the ruling Communist Party as part of its territory

title: Biden, amid questions about age, to undergo 2nd physical as president Thursday
description: President Joe Biden, who's 80, is set to undergo second physical as president on Thursday as he considers running for a another term.

title: Ruling Taliban display rare division in public over bans
description: A rare public show of division is emerging in the ranks of Afghanistan's ruling Taliban

title: FBI searches University of Delaware as part of Biden classified documents probe
description: The FBI has searched at least two locations at the University of Delaware as part of a probe into President Biden's handling of classified documents, sources say.

title: 1 dead, 3 injured in shooting at El Paso mall: Police
description: Live updates on the shooting that took place at Cielo Vista mall in El Paso on Feb. 15, 2023.

title: Restraining order granted against woman seen in Ring video allegedly harassing family
description: A court granted a St. Louis family an order of protection on Wednesday against a woman charged with harassing the family for over a year.

title: Man sentenced to life in prison now free after Missouri judge vacates his conviction
description: After serving nearly three decades of a life sentence, Lamar Johnson officially walks free for a crime he has always insisted he did not commit.

title: Ohio train derailment: Residents say they don't feel safe returning home
description: Residents of East Palestine, Ohio, are grappling with the fear that their hometown is no longer safe to reside in.
